sentences.cn: “ 妈妈, ” 孩子含着奶头答.

sentences.en: "Please stay and read to me, mummy," he beseeched.
sentences.cn: “求求你留下来给我读点东西吧，妈妈，”他央求道。

sentences.en: I'd gladly swap places with mummy any day.
sentences.cn: 什么时候让我和妈妈交换角色我都愿意。

sentences.en: I'll tell my mummy on you.
sentences.cn: 我要到妈妈那儿告你一状。

sentences.en: Mummy is so nasty to me when Daddy isn't here.
sentences.cn: 爸爸不在这儿时，妈妈对我很凶。

sentences.en: Mummy says I can play out in the garden.
sentences.cn: 妈妈说我可以到外面花园里玩。

sentences.en: Mummy would be awfully cross if she knew I was here.
sentences.cn: 妈咪要是知道我在这种地方,一定会非常不痛快.
妈咪，我可以到外面玩吗？

sentences.en: Mummy, will you give me an apple?
sentences.cn: “妈妈, 您给我个苹果吃 吧 .”

sentences.en: She wanted her mummy and daddy.
sentences.cn: 她想要她的妈妈和爸爸。

sentences.en: The enemy beat him to a mummy.
This process produces a natural mummy of the animal's carcass.
sentences.cn: 这种过程能产生动物尸体的自然状态的木乃伊.

words.tran_cn: 将…做成木乃伊；使干瘪；弄干保存

trans.tran_cn: 妈妈，木乃伊，干尸，干瘪的人
trans.tran_en: mother – used especially by young children or when you are talking to young children
